name: Hoodie
description: A hoodie is a sweatshirt with a hood.

name: T-Shirt
description: A T-shirt is a style of unisex fabric shirt named after the T shape of its body and sleeves.

name: Jacket
description: A jacket is a mid-stomach-length garment for the upper body.

name: Sweater
description: A sweater, also called a jumper in British English, is a piece of clothing.
